akas: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (original title)
akas from release info: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (original title)

1.title: Primal Grill

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Long ago before smokers and grills there was fire. Recipes include: Mussels in Pine Needles, Salmon on a Stick, Prosciutto Garlic Bread and Caveman T-Bones.

2.title: Barbecue's Birthplace

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: Recipes include: Jamaican Jerk Chicken, Sugarcane Shrimp and Buccaneer Baby Backs.

3.title: Gaucho Grill

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: There's something about the open range that brings out the griller in all of us. Recipes include: Gaucho Beef Ribs, Brazilian Pineapple and Salt-Crusted Chicken.

4.title: Italian Fire

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: A vision as old as civilization itself, a clay or brick oven fueled by live fire. Recipes include: Wood Oven Pizza, Sweet and Sour Duck and Grilled Pork Chops.

5.title: Burn in the USA

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: People grill all over Planet Barbeque but Steven believes no one does it better than in America. Recipes include: Martha's Vineyard Lobster, Texas Clod and Spit-roasted Pork.

6.title: Bombay Blast

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: If you've dined at an Indian restaurant you've probably had tandoori grilled foods. Recipes include: Tandoori Salmon, Breads from the Tandoor and Chicken Tikka Kebabs.

7.title: Asia's Crossroads

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: If Steven had to pick a single favorite region for grilling, it would be Asia. Recipes include: Guamian Chicken Salad, Malaysian Swordfish, Cambodian Corn and Singapore Beef Sates.

8.title: Heat Without Meat

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: You've asked for it, now a world tour of meatless grilling. Recipes include: Israeli Egg Pate, Malaysian Grilled Tofu and Thai Coconut Bananas.

9.title: Spanish Smoke

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

10.title: Out of Africa

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: The focus is on Africa where live fire cooking began. Recipes include: Piri Piri Wings, Cape Malay Sosaties and Kenyan Lamb.

11.title: The Best Kept Secrets of European Grilling

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

11.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

12.title: Fired Up, Down Under

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

12.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

13.title: Primal Grills for a Crowd

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

13.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Smoke Screen

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Recipes include: Home Smoked Salmon, Kansas City-style Spareribs, Turkey Pastrami and Smoke Roasted Raspberry Pear Crisp.

2.title: Kebabs of the World Unite

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: Recipes include: Beef Kabobs, Swordfish Souvlaki, Chicken Satay and Fruit Kabobs.

3.title: Make No Mis-Steak

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: How to grill the perfect steak. Recipes include: Korean Grilled Ribeyes, Tuboc T-Bones and Argentinian Fillet Minon.

4.title: Bird Meets Grill

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Recipes include: Coffee Crusted Chicken, Cinnamon Chipotle Brined Chicken and Spatchcock Game Hens with Basil Marinide.

5.title: Fish Without Fear

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: Fish that doesn't stick to the grill grate. Recipes include: Cedar Planked Salmon, Prosciutto Wrapped Trout and Grilled Swordfish and Bake.

6.title: Vegetarians at the Grill

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: Whether you're a vegetarian to someone who wants to cut back on meat, this show has you covered. Recipes include: Roasted Pepper Salad, Portobello Burgers, Vegetable Paella and Smoked Apples.

7.title: Shoulders and Butts

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: Pitmasters from around the world love pork shoulders, here's a few examples. Recipes include: Carolina Pork Shoulder, Spit Roasted Balinese Por and Mexican Pulled Pork (Cochinita Pibil).

8.title: Raichlen on Ribs

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: Mastering ribs for the aspiring grill master. Recipes include: First Timers Babyback Ribs, Five Spice Beef Short Ribs and Country Style Ribs.

9.title: Shell Games

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: From the sea to the grill, live fire brings out the sweetness of seafood. Recipes include: Grilled Shrimp Cocktail, Drunkn Sailors (Oysters), Sizzlin' Sides and Morton Bay Bugs.

10.title: One Good Turn

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: You've asked how to improve rotisserie skills. From moist meat to crackling crisp crust few things beat spit roasting. Recipes include: Spit-Roasted Babybacks, Garlic Herb Prime Rib and Five Spice Roast Duck.

11.title: Learning to Love Lamb

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

11.plot: To be an accomplished grill master you need to master lamb. Recipes include: Mexican Barbacoa, Persian Lamb Chops and Greek Lamb Burger.

12.title: Tailgating: Games On!

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

12.plot: The real reason you want to boost your barbecue skills is to show off at your next tailgate party. Recipes include: Lemon Soy London Broil, Buffacue Shrimp and Beer Marinated Chicken Wings.

13.title: Really Big Beef

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

13.plot: Size really does matter. Big beef and big game really impress your guests. Recipes include: Spit-Fired Prime Rib, Tenderloin Cheesesteak and Texas-Style Brisket.

1.title: On the Bone

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: You cannot beat the flavor of meat cooked and served on thee bone. This show releases your inner caveman. Recipes include: Marinated Veal Chops, Butterflied Short Ribs and Provencale Leg of Lamb.

2.title: In a Hurry

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: Accross the barbecue trail using a grill is the original fast food. Recipes include: Basil-Grilled Tuna, Pollo al Mattone and Coconut-Grilled Pineapple.

3.title: In the Wild

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: In the days before barbecue grills our ancestors grilled wild foods over live fire. Recipes include: Cedar-Planked Salmon, Marinated Elk Loin and Wild Fruit Crumble.

4.title: By the Sea

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Nothing brings out the briny succulence of seafood like fire. Recipes include: Brazilian Coconut Shrimp, Garlic Sesame Halibut and Snapper in Banana Leaves.

5.title: On the Range

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: Grilling brings out the cowboy in all of us. Recipes include: Coffee-Crusted Brisket, Hellfire T-Bone Steaks and Free-Range Chickens.

6.title: From the Garden

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: The vibrant flavors of vegetables on the grill will make the vegetarian happy and carnivores can learn a trick or two as well. Recipes include: Eggplant Salad, Paneer Kebabs and Portobello Cheeseburgers.

7.title: On the Vine

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: The Raichlen Rule states: If something tastes good baked, fried or sauteed, it probably tastes better grilled. Recipes include: Georgian Trout, Red Wine Chicken and Cabernet Filet Mignon.

8.title: In the Fire

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: Man started cooking by placing meat on a fire about 500,000 years ago. Recipes include: The Real Baba Ganooj, Lomo al Trapo and Uptown S'mores.

9.title: On the Rotisserie

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: It's meat cooked to a turn. Recipes include: Greek Whole Hog, Brazilian Rib Roast and Moroccan Lamb Ribs.

10.title: In a Pickle

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: Brining and Barbecue are like your first love: Once you experience it you'll never forget it. Recipes include: Bourbon-Brined Pork Chops, Cajun-Smoked Turkey and Sesame Garlic Leg of Lamb.

11.title: Up in Smoke

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

11.plot: Spice might give barbecue character but Smoke is its heart and soul. Recipes include: Chinese Smoked Duck, Cousin Dave's Chipotle Chocolate Rib and Smoke Roasted Pears.

12.title: On the Wing

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

12.plot: Chicken ranks as the world's most popular barbecue. Recipes include: Yakitori, Malaysian Spatchcocked Chicken and Herb-Stuffed Game Hens.

13.title: At the Game

episode of.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen (TV Series 2008– )

13.plot: The real reason for football is tailgating. These recipes will help you smoke the competition. Recipes include: Grilled Quesadillas, Fireman's Corn, Burgers Two Ways and Pork Chop Calzones.

imdb.title: Primal Grill with Steven Raichlen
